snippet: At an annual dinner on Thursday night, the Japan Society will formally announce that Miwako Tezuka, the associate curator at the Asia Society, has been named the new director of organization's gallery, making her its first Japanese chief.
abstract: At an annual dinner on Thursday night, the Japan Society will formally announce that Miwako Tezuka, the associate curator at the Asia Society, has been named the new director of organization's gallery, making her its first Japanese chief.

headline.main: Japan Society Names New Gallery Director
headline.print_headline: Japan Society Names New Gallery Director
